conbody.p: The complete text of 10 U.S.C. 2408, Prohibition on Persons Convicted of Defense-Contract Related Felonies and Related Criminal Penalty on Defense Contractors, is available at http://uscode.house.gov/ (Select “Search the U.S. Code”; then type “10 USC Sec. 2408” (including the quotation marks) in the search engine window and click on the search button).
